snippet: The online consumer review service Yelp reported a better-than-expected rise in quarterly revenue, driven by the strength of its advertising business.
abstract: Yelp reports quarterly loss of $22.2 million, or 29 cents per share, down from profit of $32.7 million, or 42 cents per share, in year-earlier period; revenue rises to $153.7 million from $109.9 million; results exceed analyst expectations.
lead_paragraph: The online consumer review service Yelp reported a better-than-expected rise in quarterly revenue, driven by the strength of its advertising business.

headline.main: Yelp Reports Rise in Revenue and an Executive Departure
headline.print_headline: Yelp Reports Rise in Revenue and an Executive Departure
